Articles.Content:
We all feel down from time to time. Sometimes a swift kick to the rear end is enough to make it better. Other times an internet hug from strangers helps. In this thread you post compliments to the poster above you to make their day that little bit nicer. I wouldn't call this a forum game, but if enough people do, I'll push it over.

Imaginary Post #0, your hair looks fabulous.

His imaginary hair DOES look fabulous! I love the unicorn horn and spiral rainbow...

Oh, back on topic. Rainbowtrout always has the cutest avatars and is just a generally awesome modkip. 

He also saved an entire litter of orphans from a burning puppyanage... wait, wait, I think I mixed that up.

Your avatar describes my space program.

Also, nice name.
Good to meet another jontron fan. Also, that signature is pretty.
Your avatar looks like the Cities Skylines' Chirpy - that players like or hate - but in my case I like it. I also liked that you included 'being pretty' in your post - love that expression for years.
That's a neat signature layout you got there. Certainly better than my dump down there Ã¢â€ â€œ
You're the dude from the Science Labs! You are really, really smart ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Aw, Thomas988. You're always being such a nice guy to me, and you've done plenty of awesome stuff yourself! (Your planet renders were *really* cool ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif))

Glad I got the chance to send some compliments back your way.

-Upsilon
I like your avatar. You being a judge at the Oscar-Bs really made it a good competition!
Your username will be envied by future forumers as "That cool name that I can't believe no one else took before. Like seriously".
Mukips. Nuff said
A very lovely looking avatar, and i like the way your name sounds in my head. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Even though you lack an avatar, I bet you're a real nice guy.
I have no idea who you are, but I' sure that you're an amazing person.

Your someone different can't expect a better friend to learn and share things and make the world and space better ; )

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-21T00:18:12Z" title="07/21/2015 12:18  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 21, 2015</time> by WinkAllKerb''**
The huge amount of colors on your avatar symbols the many good attributes that you have.
You love the Round 8. Isn't that enough?

> 
> You love the Round 8. Isn't that enough?

Your avatar clearly enjoys trains to the extent of manslaughter. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I loved that Mirror Greg thread! You're also a great person!

Ba-Humbug!

Kaboom knows how awesome his name is, I want him to hurry up and drop dead so I can claim it....

But till then, its good having him alive and on the forums. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

EDIT and I seriously need to get myself an avatar. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
I see you a lot around here! You seem to be a cool person! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Nice avatar, man.

And that was funny... You know, when the moderators played that little joke.
Your signature is very unique and neat, and you're a nice Forum-goer. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
You're an active and really likable member of the community, thanks for stopping by my threads from time to time!
Screw generic compliments that sound fake, I use the guy's products. They're DAMN GOOD!
